series_description: This series documents the confidential allegations and complaints concerning judicial conduct that the Commission determines do not require inquiries or charges. This series documents communications, research, and statistics. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, investigative memoranda, and databases

This series documents the personal history, service and Commission interaction with each judge, as well as the Commissionâ€™s investigation and disposition of any complaints, inquiries and charges alleging judicial misconduct, as defined Commission Rule 2. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, investigative memoranda, transcripts, audio and/or video recordings, draft and final legal notices, charging documents, memoranda, briefs, orders, physical exhibits, and databases
